options.optionText: What in the actual fuck just happened?
options.responseText: What does it look like? Science, obviously. Didn’t you read the Overseer’s memo on ‘pushing the boundaries of research’? My boundaries just got smashed hard, I tell ya. Also, relax. Those are just babies. Wait till I lure adult ones!

followUpOptions.emotion: Characters/Overseer Daughter/emotions/after deathclaw fuck/closed eyes, determined
followUpOptions.responseText: Absolutely. This is frontier biology, baby. I just wrote the book on radioactive sex education—with my pussy. It’s called hands-on experimentation. Well, maybe not hands-on. More like claws-on. Either way, I deserve a Nobel Prize... and a nap.

followUpOptions.optionText: Please tell me they're leaving now...
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, they’re staying. We just bonded. This bog is officially our love nest now. Plus, I'm like 90% sure at least one of them knocked me up, so congrats—you’re gonna be an uncle!

followUpOptions.emotion: Characters/Overseer Daughter/emotions/after deathclaw fuck/closed eyes, determined
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, absolutely. Best stress relief I’ve had since... forever. Besides, you saw the way he looked at me—like a fresh Brahmin steak. Who could resist?

options.optionText: I don’t even know where to start with how fucked up that was...
options.emotion: Characters/Overseer Daughter/emotions/after deathclaw fuck/closed eyes, sad
options.responseText: Then maybe don’t start at all. Just fetch me a towel, some rad-away, and extra ball sweat if you can manage it. Science demands repeatability—and my pussy’s ready for round two.
